item.title: This Porsche 930 Turbo Has Been Unleashed
item.description:
This Porsche 930 Turbo Has Been Unleashed

"This car garners attention from everyone," says Grant Karnes, "and I think it kind of draws everybody in to what Porsche is." Owned by a family friend who later sold it to his father, Karnes had known about and lusted after this particular car for years.

item.title: New diesel cars will be road tested by EPA in wake of VW scandal
item.description:
New diesel cars will be road tested by EPA in wake of VW scandal

On Sunday, The New York Times reported that the United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) will be expanding its tests on diesel passenger vehicles, including on-road testing in addition to lab tests. Up to 800,000 additional vehicles are affected.
